How do I make DkService.exe not run at startup?
Start>Run>Services.msc>DkService>Manual

grimboyd IS Correct! ...

Run crack.bat (this batch file runs crack.exe)

Allow restart Windows.

On restart, run setup.exe

Leave 2 boxes ticked on first window

When "What do you want to do next appears, select NEVER REGISTER"

When you first run it, select CANCEL when it asks to check for upgrades.

30 days trial freezes @ 30 days!

I seem to have gotten this to work with Vista Home Premium (32 bit).  The directions would fail due to a delete error code 5 on tab.dll.

If you have this problem do this:
Start -- type 'services' in the search box
find the Diskeeper service and double click it.
change the startup type to 'disabled'
reboot
run the crack.bat file and it should complete successfully.  

I can't vouch for if the crack actually cracks it, but i haven't had any trial notices or anything like that.  I'll report back if I see anything come up.
Oh one more thing.  After the crack is finished running go back into services and change the Diskeeper service back to automatic start.  :P
